backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing restaurants, user favorites, and profiles with mock data generation and access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling roles of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment config defining data source mode and external API credentials.
frontend/EXTERNAL_API_SETUP.md: Documentation explaining how to enable and configure external restaurant API mode.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and dark theme variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template loading Poppins fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component rendering DiscoveryPage inside a black full‑screen container.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Action: Like/reject action buttons styled with success and reject colors and interactive animations.
frontend/src/components/discovery/AdPlac: Dark‑themed ad card with orange accented 'Sponsored' label and placeholder visuals.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Filter: Bottom sheet UI for selecting category, budget, and location filters with orange accent styling.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Restau: Displays a restaurant card with photo carousel, navigation, fallback image handling, and name/ratings overlay.
frontend/src/components/discovery/StarRa: Renders a star-based rating indicator with support for half stars and configurable max stars.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Swipea: Provides drag-based swipe detection and animation for a card, triggering left/right swipe callbacks.
frontend/src/components/discovery/SwipeC: Manages a stack of swipeable cards, rendering restaurants or ads and handling swipe actions with animation.
frontend/src/config/dataSource.ts: Configures data source mode, validates external API setup, and exposes API configuration helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscoveryDeck.ts: Builds a deck of restaurant and ad items, filtering hidden restaurants and inserting periodic ads.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscoveryFilters.t: Manages discovery filter state and provides a method to apply current filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles saving favorite restaurants via backend actor, supporting mock and external modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocation.ts: Retrieves the user's geolocation with loading, error, and permission handling.
Tracks session-only hidden restaurant IDs and provides functions to add, check, and clear them.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, including login, identity loading, and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching restaurants from mock or external APIs and returns normalized results plus data source warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeStack.ts: Manages swipe state for a stack of items, tracking index, last action, and completion.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables, and utility classes for a dark theme with accent colors and effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Implements the restaurant discovery flow with filters, geolocation, swiping, favorites, warnings, and UI components.
frontend/src/types/restaurant.ts: Defines the NormalizedRestaurant type extending Restaurant with photoUrls.
frontend/src/utils/externalRestaurantAda: Adapts external API restaurant data into the internal Restaurant format with safe defaults and parsing logic.
frontend/src/utils/favoritePayload.ts: Converts a NormalizedRestaurant into a backend-safe Restaurant payload by stripping UI-only fields.
frontend/src/utils/hotPepperBudget.ts: Maps price range selections to Hot Pepper budget codes and provides label helpers.
frontend/src/utils/restaurantNormalize.t: Normalizes restaurant photo data to produce exactly five photo URLs and provides helpers for arrays and placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's tracked features, metadata, and state version for the DishMatch project.
